text: Va tark kun (ej Pajomʙar) on musrikonero, ki dini islomro ʙozicavu lahv giriftaand va zindagonii dunjo fireʙason dod. Va ʙa Qur'on pandason deh, to xudro ʙa saʙaʙi gunoh va kufrason dar azoʙ ducor nakunand. Cuz Alloh dodrasu safo'atkunanda nadorand. Va agar ʙaroi rahoii xes az azoʙ har guna fidja dihand ham, pazirufta naxohad sud. Inho ʙa saʙaʙe, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulas va ʙa dini islom kofir sudand, ʙarojason dar duzax saroʙe az oʙi cuson va azoʙi dardovare muhajjo sudaast
